home-left:
Thank you for joining us in Bangalore as we celebrate the beginning of our married life together. This site has everything you need to plan your trip, from hotel details to local recommendations.

Please use the Travel page to find your room or apartment information, and don’t hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.
home-right:
Weekend Schedule

Saturday, 13th December 2025 — Reception (6:30 PM onwards)

Sunday, 14th December 2025 — Muhurtham (9:00 AM to 10:15 AM)

Formal invitations will include exact times and locations.
story-content:
It started with a matrimonial site, a late night phone call, and a conversation that lasted much longer than either of us expected.

Since we met we have collected the best the city of Chicago has to offer, inside jokes, and insights into each others mind. We have supported each other through new jobs, many trips across the Atlantic, and everything in between.

We cannot wait to celebrate this next chapter with all of you, our favorite people, in the city that means so much to us.

Timeline

March 2025 — A beautiful conversation


June 2025 — Got engaged


December 2025 — Getting married in Bangalore

qa-content:
What should I wear?

Think festive and comfortable. Traditional Indian attire or semi-formal Western outfits are both welcome.

Can I bring a plus one?

If your invitation mentions a guest by name, they are warmly invited! If you’re unsure, feel free to reach out.

Are children invited?

We love your little ones, but due to space we’re keeping the event mostly adults-only, with exceptions noted on specific invitations.

Will there be transportation?

We plan to provide group transportation between the main hotel and the ceremony. Details will be shared closer to the date.
todo-content:
If you’re traveling from out of town, we hope you’ll get to explore Bangalore a little while you’re here.

  • Coffee in Indiranagar or Koramangala.
  • Walk through Cubbon Park in the early morning.
  • Visit one of the city’s many bookstores and cafes.
  • Enjoy a dosa, filter coffee, and some local sweets.
Neighborhoods
MG Road Indiranagar Koramangala Whitefield

We’ll share more detailed recommendations closer to the wedding.
registry-content:
Your love and presence in Bangalore are the greatest gifts we could ask for. If you would still like to give a gift, we’ll share registry details here soon.

In the meantime, sharing travel photos and memories with us is more than enough.
